gguan®]®'®[renben®]ji®[shengtai]®dengyuansu®.zhicijieshuhou®,chenyuanzhangyuxingzhengyuanlimengyaPmishuzhang®'linzilunfayanren®'dongbulianhefuwuzhongxinguoyingyifuzhixingzhang®'jiaotongbuchenyanbocizhang®'fukunqilifaweiyuan®'hualianxianxuxueyufuyizhangdengrenjinxingxiandishicha®,yousuhuagonglugaishangongchengchulizongrenchuzhangjinxingjieshuo®,liaojie4uguaxiyiwangongdebeishangxianxinqiaojikezhengshEgongdenanxiaxianxinqiaodegaijiangongchengjindujixiaoyi®.

uanzhangzaizhongyangqixiangshuchengjiapingshuzhangpeitongjieshuoxia®,tingquweixingleida®'taikongtianqi®'shuzhitianqiyubaojizhanqu®'diqiuzhanshixitongdengdaolan®,bingyuxingzhengyuanlinzilunfayanren®'guojiakexuejijishuweiyuanhuiwuzhengzhongzhurenweiyuan®'zhongyangqixiangshuchengjiapingshuzhangdengrenyudiqiuzhanshixitongqian®,yucanyuhuodongdegaozhongshishengheyingliunian®.

xingzhengyuanzhangchenjianrenjin®(®)richuxinian《tianxiazazhi》「tianxiayongxugongminjiang®]banjiangdianlishi®,biaozhanghuojiangqiyeduituidonghuanjingyongxudegongxian®,bingqixutamenchixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming®'jinbu®'guanhuai®'yongxujiazhifazhan®,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwanmaixiang®[jinglingpaifang®]deqituxin®.yuanzhangqiangdiao®,zhongyangyudifang®'zhengfuyuminjianyingtouguogongsixieli®,shitaiwanzoudegngwenjian®,jinerchengweiyazhoudiquhuanjingbaohu®'qihoubianqianyinyingjitanfeiguanlidengfangmiandexuexikaimo®,yidazaogengjianren®'yongxudetaiwan®.chenyuanzhangzhichu®,®[tianxiayongxugongminjiang®]jingzhengxiangdangjilie®,huojiangqiyezai®[gongsizhili®]®'®[qiyechengnuo®]®'®[shehuicanyu®]®'®[huanjingyongxu®]dengsidapingxuangoumianbiaoxianyouyi®,congduojiaqiyezhongtuoyingerchu®,pingxuanweitaiwanzuijiayongxuqiye®,xiangdangburongyi®,tayaozhishangchengzhigonghezhiyi®.chenyuanzhangganxie《tianxiazazhi》lianxunianjuban®[tianxiayongxugongminjiang®]®,guliqiyezhangqitouruqiyeshehuizeren®,weitaiwanshehuiyongxugonghao®'dianfangongchuangjiningjugongshizhuruzhongyaoliliang®;tayeqixuhuojiangqiyezaijiezaili®,chixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixianKqingming®'jinbu®'guanhuai®'yongxujiazhifazhan®,chengweitaiwansuoyouqiyedexuexidianfan®,bujinrangtaiwanzouxiangshijiewutai®,yerangquanshijiekanjiantaiwantuidongjinglingpaifangdeqituxin®.chenyuanzhangtidao®,guanlicelvedashimaike．bote®(®)cengtichangyong®[chuangzaogongxiangjiazhi®]®(®)dazaoquanqkiuqiyexiayibojingzhengli®,mingqu-miaoshu®[qiyeshehuizeren®(®)®]dejingyi®,zhuzhangquanqiuqiyelingdaorendangwuzhiji®,jiushisikaojiangqiyeshehuizerenhuodongyuqiyejingzhengyoushijiehe®,bingchuangzaochuqiyegongtongzhuiqiu®[yongxujingying®]dejingzhengliu®.chenyuanzhangjinyibushuoming®,xiangtonggainianyekeyunyongzaiguojiazhilishang®,xingzhengyuanweiguancheyongxufazhansiwei®,zhanxianzhuanxingjuexin®,yijiang®[jinglingpaifang®]mubiaonaru《qihoubianqianyginyingfa》，gebuhuijiexujuyiluxutuixingzhengshoutanfei®'chenglitanquanjiaoyisuodengpeitaofangan®,bingtouguo®[xiangguan inweixuduoyuanxiangweizizhitixi®,qingyuanminhuixiezhuyuanxianglingdaozheyougenghaodezaihaifangjiunengli®,weilaiyingdu5ao®'qianghuayuanxiangzaipingshidejianzaiyuzhengbeigongzuo®,anzhaozaiqudejiuzhujihua®,xiezhuyuanxiangfangzaibiyaodejingfeibianlie®,jiluoshizhxinggezhongzaihaijiance®'yubao®'jingbaofabu®'wuzizhengbei®'yanxi®'xunliandeng®,rangyuanminhuizaiyuanxiangdiqubanyangengzhongyaodefangjiuzaijuese®.zaifuyuanchongjiandebufen®,chenyuanzhangbiaoshi®,xingzhengyuanhuichengli®[dusuruiyukanutaifengzaihoufuyuanchongjiantuidongzhuananxiaozu®]®,qingxingzhengyuangonggonggongchengweiyuanhuitongchoubanli®,fuyuanchongjiandegongchengyichengxulaitibao®,yougongchenghuijinxingshencha®,dusiyugejidifangzhengfufuyuanchongjiansuoxudejingfei®,yeqinggebuhuixiediaodifangzhengfuyuguxuyongjingfei®,xianyi®[yihuanjiji®]fangshizhiying®,zaiyouxingzhengyuanzhujizongchujiesuanduidifangzhengfuzaihaizhunbeijinshiyuyikouchuguidian®.yuanzhangqiangdiao®,jiuzaiqiangjiushikeyidingyaojishichuli®,buhuiyoujingfeixiangguanwenti®,qingdajiayiqinuli®,rangdifangzaorihuifuzhengchangshenghuo®.

hangzhaojianshedeng®.lingwai®,touguoqianzhanjihuadeshuihuanjingjianshe®,shitaiwanjinnianalisuimianlinliangcibainindahan®,touguoshuiyuandiaodu®,tingguoqueshuideweiji®,ergaopingxizhuodusuiyintaifengbiaogaodaopingchangdebei®,yyeinzengjialefuliushuidnegshuiyuan®,ranggaoxiongshidegongshuidouzhengchangwending®.chenyuanzhangjinyibuzhichu®,guojiduiwoguojichujiansheyiduoyouhaoping®,lirugenjuquanqiujugongxinlideruishiluosangguanlixueyuan®(®)zuixinfabude｢shijiejingzhenglinianbao｣shuju®,zaigeshoupingguojiadangzhong®,taiwanzongtipaimingcongniandedimingtishengzhiniandediming®,yijujinbuming®;qizhong®,zaijichujianshexiangmubufen®,congniandediming®,tishengzhiniandediming®.yuanzhangqiangdiao®,yinweiqianzhanjianshedetouru®,rangtaiwanjichujianshezhibiaodepaimingnenggoutisheng®,xianjianqianzhanjianshequeshiyifahuixiaoyi®,rangguowaikandaotaiwan®,yeweizisundaxiagengxingfu®'gengwennuandeweilai®,qingdajiajixunuli®.

ian®(shi®)zhengfuzhuanzhigongsilijiaobaofuwujigouyunyong®;lingjiaoyubuguominjixueqianjiaoyushuyeyihanqinggezhixiashi®'xian®(shc®)zhengfuyujinnianzengjiabanliyongyaoanquanyanxichangci®,bingjiangbuzhuqibanlijingfei®,yitishengjiaobaofuwujigouxiangguanrenyuanjijiazhangduituoyaojiyongyaoanquanzhuanyezhineng®,rangqinshigongtongweihuyouerjiankang®.
